mapper.select: SELECT custom, gf_url, gf_status, live_stream_status FROM kt_md_custom mc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sp_comp_name, gf_status FROM svcdb.kt_svc c INNER JOIN kt_gf_mon gm ON c.svc_name=gm.service ) gf ON mc.custom=gf.sp_comp_name LEFT JOIN ( SELECT z.customer, SUM(z.cnt) AS live_stream_status FROM ( SELECT customer, CASE WHEN mon_status = 'OK' || mon_status = 'RECOVERY' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS cnt FROM strmondb.t_stream_mon WHERE telco_gubun = 'KT' AND deleted_yn='N' ) z GROUP BY z.customer ) stream ON mc.custom=stream.customer
